Hello sappo friends,

A moment of silence and a toast for the passing of Kabosu (aka the original Doge, also the sunny face of Dogecoin). Gone but never forgotten, he has left behind a meme-orable legacy* (and maybe a revival in Dogecoin?)

After that truly depressing news, if you need something to brighten your mood, check out this year’s Pet Gala which was a downpour of cuteness with best-dressed dogs flooding the red carpet. If you need some inspo for what to wear to Met Ball, this is the place.

And on a political front, the UK has called a general election** for July 4th. There was something so beautiful about Rishi calling this in the pouring rain, with “Things Can Only Get B(W)etter” by the one and only Brian Cox playing in the background. Unfortunately for everyone, this date clashes with Taylor Swift's concert in Amsterdam. Royal Mail is going to have to gear up for the flood of postal votes—let’s hope they can weather the storm!

See you in the SCR (or somewhere else? Looks like something is going?)  at 5.30

The Sappoteers

 

*I got this pun from ChatGPT

**petition to call this genny lec***

***can’t claim this one either, got it from twitter****

****X
